last_episode_to_air.name: Dame of Cocaine
last_episode_to_air.overview: This is the true story of Andrea Mohr from Germany. She was involved in international drug smuggling and other criminal activities such as organized crime. She organized numerous drug trades around the world. She served a prison sentence from 1999 to 2004 in the high-security prison for women in Australia, in the Dame Phyllis Frost Centre near Melbourne, Victoria, Australia.

name: Banged Up Abroad
overview: Documentary series where viewers are taken inside accounts of capture, incarceration, and terror far away from home with intimate personal interviews and dramatic reenactments.

episodes.name: Costa Rica/Mexico (Scott and Lucy's Story)
episodes.overview: Scott Campbell and Lucy Baker are British travellers arrested in Mexico.

episodes.name: Australia (Mark's Story)
episodes.overview: Mark Knowles is arrested in Sydney after attempting to smuggle cocaine from the U.S. to Australia.

episodes.name: Venezuela/Margarita Island (Denis and Donald's Story)
episodes.overview: Donald McNeil, a yachtsman, is arrested after being pressured to collect an enormous shipment of cocaine worth 30 million pounds (more than $43.2 million in U.S. dollars).

episodes.name: Thailand (The Sandra Gregory Story)
episodes.overview: Sandra Gregory is arrested in Thailand trying to smuggle heroin into Japan.

episodes.name: Peru (Krista and Jennifer's Story/Peruvian Prison Nightmare)
episodes.overview: Krista Barnes and Jennifer Davis are two American women arrested for trying to smuggle cocaine out of Peru.

episodes.name: Venezuela (James and Paul's Story)
episodes.overview: Jim Miles and Paul Loseby, two British teenagers, are arrested in Venezuela for trying to smuggle drugs.

episodes.name: Nepal (Piers' Story)
episodes.overview: Piers Hernu, a dual British-French traveller, is arrested trying to smuggle 28 kilos of gold bullion from Hong Kong to Nepal.

episodes.name: Colombia
episodes.overview: The Colombian National Liberation Army kidnaps American adventurer Glen Heggstad.

episodes.name: Uganda: Death in the Jungle
episodes.overview: Safari guide Mark Ross and his tour group are kidnapped by Hutu rebels in Uganda.

episodes.name: Nightmare in Chechnya
episodes.overview: Jon James and Camilla Carr move from England to contribute to a children's centre in war torn Chechnya... only to be kidnapped for ransom.

episodes.name: India: Hostage to Terror
episodes.overview: Rhys Partridge and BÃ©la Nuss are kidnapped by British terrorist Ahmed Omar Saeed Sheikh while travelling in India.

episodes.name: Philippines: Fatal Mission
episodes.overview: Gracia and Martin Burnham, Christian missionaries in the Philippines, are kidnapped by members of Abu Sayyaf, a Muslim fundamentalist group.

episodes.name: Malaysia
episodes.overview: While vacationing in Malaysia, Monique and Callie Strydom are kidnapped by a Muslim militant group and held hostage for four months in the Philippines.

episodes.name: Cuzco
episodes.overview: Simon's trip to Peru is initiated by his friend Sarah Jackson who convinces him to smuggle drugs. Things turn bad for Simon when he is handed a lengthy prison sentence.

episodes.name: Bangladesh
episodes.overview: Lia McCord, an American teenager, is arrested in Bangladesh for trying to smuggle heroin.

episodes.name: Kuwait
episodes.overview: Scott White is arrested in Kuwait for selling hashish, then escapes from jail during the 1990 invasion of Kuwait.

episodes.name: Pakistan
episodes.overview: Amardeep Bassey, a British journalist on the way to Afghanistan for an assignment, is accused of being a spy and arrested in Pakistan.

episodes.name: Lima
episodes.overview: Russell Thoresen, an American traveller, is arrested in Peru for trying to smuggle cocaine.

episodes.name: Taiwan
episodes.overview: Taiwan's most-wanted criminal breaks into the house of McGill Alexander, a South African army colonel, and takes Alexander and his family hostage.

episodes.name: Ecuador
episodes.overview: An American, Daniel Van De Zande is arrested trying to smuggle cocaine from Ecuador to Europe.

episodes.name: South Korea
episodes.overview: Cullen Thomas, working with his girlfriend "Rocket," is arrested trying to smuggle hashish from the Philippines to South Korea.

episodes.name: Caracas/Venezuela Blues
episodes.overview: David Evans is arrested trying to smuggle drugs from Venezuela to Amsterdam.

episodes.name: Kidnapped in the Philippines
episodes.overview: Church volunteer Greg Williams is kidnapped and tortured by members of Abu Sayyaf.

episodes.name: Puerto Vallarta/Mexican Justice
episodes.overview: Jake Libbon gets arrested in Mexico for selling marijuana, then is falsely accused of shooting two police officers.

episodes.name: Brazil/Sao Paulo Death Trap
episodes.overview: Hollywood "party animal" Brendan Cosso and three friends are arrested trying to smuggle cocaine out of Brazil to Hungary.

episodes.name: Indonesia/Busted In Bali
episodes.overview: A random encounter with a family friend at the Bali airport was all it took to land Chris Parnell in jail and arrested on charges of smuggling 12 kilos of hashish.

episodes.name: Mexico/Teen Smuggler
episodes.overview: Alex Silva grew up in the ghetto of El Paso Texas. Son to a single mother who didn't care he wasn't going anywhere. A small job at an auto shop got him involved in smuggling drugs from Mexico.

episodes.name: Cuba/Hooked In Havana
episodes.overview: When Kahlilah met big-shot music producer Roy, she didn't expect that her life would change forever. Just months into their relationship, Roy forced her to smuggle 18 pounds of cocaine.

episodes.name: Iraq/Kidnapped In Iraq
episodes.overview: Journalists Scott Taylor and Zeynep Tugrul are kidnapped by insurgents who accuse them of being American spies.

episodes.name: Barbados/Busted And Pregnant
episodes.overview: British teen Zara Whittaker is arrested at an airport trying to smuggle cocaine out of Barbados.

episodes.name: Betrayed In Ecuador
episodes.overview: An unsuspecting woman, Zoe McGarry, is given a suitcase full of cocaine and is arrested when attempting to board a plane with it.

episodes.name: Sierra Leone/Jungle Siege
episodes.overview: During a U.N. peace mission, a minor incident sparks nationwide fighting, leading Major Phil Ashby to flee his disarmament camp and chance survival in a daring escape through the jungle.

episodes.name: Jamaica/Jamaican Getaway
episodes.overview: T.K. White and her girlfriend are sent to Kingston's notorious central prison after attempting to smuggle marijuana.

episodes.name: India/Delhi/Party Girl
episodes.overview: Clare Matthews quits her job and travels to India. But when money gets tight, she gambles for a quick payout: sending hash illegally to London via parcel. It works the first time, even the second. But the third time, her luck runs out and she ends up in one of the world's largest jails.

episodes.name: The Real Midnight Express
episodes.overview: In intimate detail, Locked Up Abroad reveals Billy Hayes' real-life experience behind the Oscar-winning 1978 film, "Midnight Express."

episodes.name: Saddam's Iraq
episodes.overview: When Saddam Hussein invaded Kuwait in 1990, Tom Lynch and his fellow contractor John White decided to get out of Iraq while they still could, but were captured by Iraqi soldiers and taken to a notorious prison in Baghdad, where they must listen to inmates being tortured to death.

episodes.name: Tokyo Takedown
episodes.overview: After accepting an offer to work as a hostess in Japan, Jackie Nichols meets a charming Israeli drug smuggler and agrees to smuggle hashish with him. She gets away with it four times, but the fifth time, she's not so lucky.

episodes.name: Bangkok Underworld
episodes.overview: A 28-year-old English teacher named Tim Schrader agrees to smuggle eight kilos of heroin into the U.S. to solve his financial problems. Although he knows he could receive the death penalty, the money is too tempting to resist.

episodes.name: Spain / Smuggler Makeover
episodes.overview: With his girlfriend pregnant, American musician Michael Morey needs money and agrees to smuggle cocaine from Quito to Spain. He barely makes it through Ecuadorian customs, but when he lands and goes through Spanish customs, he's not so lucky.

episodes.name: Panama / Colombia Ambush
episodes.overview: A jungle adventure turns sour when American backpacker Mark Wedeven and his travel companions are taken hostage by armed guerilla soldiers in Panama.

episodes.name: The Real Goodfella
episodes.overview: Henry Hill--who inspired the movie Goodfellas--relays the true story of his rise and fall as a drug dealing wiseguy in the New York mob.

episodes.name: Saudi Bootlegger
episodes.overview: Scottish chef Gordon Malloch arrives in Saudi Arabia to start a new life as a catering manager, but quickly finds himself a profitable sideline as a bootlegger.

episodes.name: Forbidden Love
episodes.overview: Briton David Scott tells the story of finding his soulmate in the Philippines, and risking a 14-year prison sentence for adultery.

episodes.name: Mexico Money Machine
episodes.overview: After heading to Mexico with a suitcase of fake money to buy drugs, California bodybuilder Jeremy Khinoo finds himself behind bars and in big trouble.

episodes.name: Heroin Sting
episodes.overview: After being caught with a kilo of heroin in Mauritius, Brigene Young faces 45 years in jail unless she can help catch the drug traffickers. Young eventually served 7 years in prison.

episodes.name: Daredevil Drug Runner
episodes.overview: The tale of Chris Chance, whose daredevil life smuggling cannabis into the U.K. concealed in a rubber body suit leads to a nasty prison sentence at Carabanchel Prison.

episodes.name: The Cocaine Trap
episodes.overview: Stephen Sutton gets caught up when he is offered $15,000 to transport cocaine disguised as gold, leading to an 11-year prison sentence.

episodes.name: Drug Dealer Revenge
episodes.overview: Company director Robert Pringle is sentenced to seven years in a violent South-American lock-up after being pressured by his dealer to smuggle drugs.

episodes.name: Teenage Drug Smuggler
episodes.overview: Vivian Carrasquillo faces a crash diet in jail after an attempt to raise funds for gastric bypass surgery by becoming a drug mule backfires.

episodes.name: Backstabbed in Thailand
episodes.overview: Military veteran Kim Hood faces life behind bars in a squalid Thai prison after being caught smuggling 14 kilos of heroin with a friend, Lisa Taylor.

episodes.name: From Hollywood to Hell
episodes.overview: When young actor Erik AudÃ© discovers that he was tricked into smuggling opium out of Pakistan, he must fight to stay alive and clear his name.

episodes.name: The Juggler Smuggler
episodes.overview: Travelling magician Mark Greening juggles a young family with a budding hash-smuggling business after moving to Japan, but he soon gets caught.

episodes.name: Escape from Argentina
episodes.overview: Lucy Wright is a nursing student when her life goes from bad to worse to hell. Her boyfriend leaves, she becomes addicted to crack, and the bills keep piling up.

episodes.name: Highway to Hell
episodes.overview: Adventure-seeker Thomas Hamill takes a job driving trucks in Iraq, leading to a terrifying time in captivity after being kidnapped by insurgents.

episodes.name: Black Palace of Horrors
episodes.overview: Dwight Worker is busted in Mexico for smuggling coke and attempts a daring escape from one of the country's most notorious prison.

episodes.name: Cocaine Mule Mom
episodes.overview: Ruthie Lambert, a middle-aged mother of three, decides to smuggle drugs to make ends meet. She is imprisoned for years but eventually escapes by bribing a corrupt official.

episodes.name: Dangerous Liaisons
episodes.overview: British nurse Stephen Comiskey, who takes a job in Saudi Arabia to support his family, draws the unwelcome attention of the Saudi religious police after a series of illicit gay affairs.

episodes.name: Colombian Kidnap
episodes.overview: Erez Eltawil and Reini Weigel are among eight backpackers who are snatched by guerrillas during a trek in remote northern Colombia.

episodes.name: Caribbean Nightmare
episodes.overview: David and Jayne Bladen's dream of a new life overseas turns into a nightmare journey of drug smuggling and violence culminating in 20 months behind bars.

episodes.name: Son of Saddam
episodes.overview: Iraqi soldier Latif Yahia describes how he was summoned to Saddam Hussein's palace and forced to become the body double of the dictator's eldest and most notorious son, Uday.

episodes.name: My Dad the Smuggler
episodes.overview: Scott Campbell goes travelling in China with his estranged father, only to find out that his dad is a professional smuggler carrying 20 kilos of cannabis.

episodes.name: I Am Not a Terrorist
episodes.overview: Duane Wollum is about to make some easy money smuggling cocaine, until an airport security check reveals that he is concealing a package.

episodes.name: Hasidic King of Coke
episodes.overview: Orthodox Jew Samuel Leibowitz dreams of making millions as a drug kingpin in Brazil, leading to a terrifying term in the deadly Carandiru Penitentiary.

episodes.name: Not Without My Baby
episodes.overview: When Susan's Haglof's adoption goes wrong, she ends up in an Egyptian jail, facing a charge of human trafficking.

episodes.name: Chilean Prison Break
episodes.overview: The gripping story of Tom Hanway, who flees a Chilean prison with a fellow prisoner, taking a dangerous and fatal escape route across the desert.

episodes.name: The Orchid Hunters
episodes.overview: The shocking story of Tom Hart Dyke and Paul Winder, two British backpackers who are ambushed and held for ransom by a guerilla group while crossing the notoriously dangerous Darien Gap.

episodes.name: Venezuela Hustle
episodes.overview: Desperate to keep his family afloat, Paul Keany agrees to smuggle six kilos of cocaine from Venezuela back to Dublin, but it turns out to be the worst decision of his life.

episodes.name: Busted in Bangkok
episodes.overview: Thrown into a notorious Bangkok prison for attempting to smuggle heroin, Angela Carnegie has an epiphany while nursing a fellow inmate with a drug addiction.

episodes.name: Nightmare in Somalia
episodes.overview: The terrifying story of photojournalist Nigel Brennan and reporter Amanda Lindhout, who are held hostage for 15 months by a criminal gang in Somalia.

episodes.name: Escape From the Gulag
episodes.overview: It's 1976 in Cold War Moscow, and American Jerry Amster finds himself in the worst situation possible: busted for smuggling drugs from Kuala Lumpur to Russia.

episodes.name: Vietnam POWs: McCain and Brace
episodes.overview: As the longest POW in Vietnam, Ernie Brace likely endured more than any other POW during the war. After years in the jungle, he went to the infamous 'Hanoi Hilton' prison and heard an American voice: Lt. Cmdr. John McCain.

episodes.name: Raving Arizona
episodes.overview: Shaun Attwood left England to be a stockbroker in America and finds himself dealing ecstasy.

episodes.name: Snakes on a Plane
episodes.overview: Tom Crutchfield smuggled snakes, tarantulas and king cobras around the world. But when the U.S. builds a case against him, Tom escapes to Belize. There, authorities imprison him without electricity or plumbing.

episodes.name: Buried Alive
episodes.overview: For Roy Hallums, a routine trip to the office turned into the fight for his life. In 2004, the 20-year Navy veteran was working in Iraq when he was suddenly kidnapped.

episodes.name: Mexican Prison Escape
episodes.overview: In the summer of 1972, five young Americans are caught trying to smuggle more than 2,000 pounds of marijuana out of Mexico and are locked up in one of the country's most violent prisons.

episodes.name: The Real Argo
episodes.overview: Hear the real story behind the Academy Award-winning movie 'Argo' from those who inspired it. Locked Up Abroad sits down with Antonio Mendez, the CIA officer portrayed by Ben Affleck, along with former hostages.

episodes.name: Hippie Mafia
episodes.overview: Eddie Padilla is living the 'high life' and drug smuggling to support his cocaine habit. But a run-in with the Peruvian police sends him to a prison called 'House of the Devil.' Eddie tells the story of his daring escape.

episodes.name: Vegas Mobster
episodes.overview: Vegas, 1979, and Frank Cullotta's 'Hole in the Wall' gang is becoming notorious. The FBI catches up to him and while not exactly 'locked up abroad,' he enters witness protection. Now Frank shares his mob secrets.

episodes.name: Fast, Furious and Busted
episodes.overview: Locked Up Abroad comes home to the United States to visit 19-year-old street racer Rick Cedar in Spokane, Washington.

episodes.name: Hunting Mr. Nice
episodes.overview: When British schoolteacher Howard Marks agrees to help an old friend finish off a drug deal, he has no idea that it will be the start of a new career.

episodes.name: Plane Crash Marijuana
episodes.overview: In 1972 Jim PapRocki is flying nearly a ton of marijuana from Mexico to the U.S. He's forced to crash land, with Mexican police hot on his heels.

episodes.name: Thai Prison Hell
episodes.overview: In 1993, 25-year-old Australian Martin Garnett is already earning good money at a luxury car dealership in Sydney, but he's hungry for more. He is caught smuggling 4.7 kilos of heroin into Bangkok and is set to become Australia's longest serving prisoner overseas.

episodes.name: Bogota Belly Bust
episodes.overview: Tabitha Ritchie decides to fix her life after years of substance abuse and the loss of her children. But in Colombia she enters an even darker world.

episodes.name: Somali Pirate Hostage Hell
episodes.overview: The shocking story of South African couple Debbie Calitz and Bruno Pelizzari, who were kidnapped by Somali pirates and held captive for 20 terrifying months.

episodes.name: Gadaffi's American Prisoner
episodes.overview: Captured by Gaddafi's men while fighting with rebels in Libya, Baltimore-born Matthew VanDyke spent nearly six months in solitary confinement.

episodes.name: Jungle Terror
episodes.overview: The traumatic story of an American schoolboy and his mother, who were kidnapped by Abu Sayyaf, a jihadist group, in the Philippines and held for ransom in the jungle.

episodes.name: Breaking Bad in Britain
episodes.overview: The story of convicted drug dealer Pieter Tritton, whose organization used camping tents to smuggle cocaine from Ecuador to Europe.

episodes.name: Narco at Nineteen
episodes.overview: In 2012 Simone Blignaut has a lucrative job working for one of Johannesburgâs biggest drug dealers, but when her boss entrusts her to fly to Bolivia and secure a major cocaine deal, the 19-year-old is in over her head.

episodes.name: Double Crossed in the Desert
episodes.overview: Journalist Phil is investigating illegally deployed chemical weapons when heâs taken hostage.

episodes.name: Mexican Border Bust
episodes.overview: When smuggling marijuana was interrupted, Steve  faced time behind bars unless he could escape.

episodes.name: Escape From Al Qaeda
episodes.overview: Kidnapped by Al Qaeda, Matthew must decide to escape or stay with his fellow American prisoner.

episodes.name: Bad Bromance
episodes.overview: Lemar must survive one of Colombiaâs most brutal prisons, after getting caught with cocaine.

episodes.name: Thailand/Thai Meth Bust
episodes.overview: Jimmy gives up his job as a postman to open a bar in Thailand, but quickly starts dealing meth. The police get wise and in a dramatic takedown bust him and send him to prison.

episodes.name: Greece/Greek Border Bust
episodes.overview: David embarks on an epic road trip, where he attempts to smuggle hash from Afghanistan to Germany. He is caught in Greece and imprisoned on an island.

episodes.name: Dominican Republic/Caribbean Coke King
episodes.overview: Unemployed Michael Singh tries cocaine smuggling to make money. But after 7 successful runs, Michael is caught and left to rot in a Dominican prison.

episodes.name: Mexico/Mexican Cartel Hell
episodes.overview: In Mexico, Carlos Quijas is falsely imprisoned and tortured for drug smuggling. Inside Mexico's most dangerous prison, he has to get tough to survive.

episodes.name: Argentina/Narco Wine Bust
episodes.overview: Champion skier Nick Brewer gets involved in a multi-million dollar cocaine empire in Argentina.

episodes.name: Thailand/Bangkok Betrayal
episodes.overview: Hip hop dancer LaTasha thinks she's been offered the opportunity of a lifetime, but opportunity turns to nightmare when she finds herself locked up and pregnant in a Thai jail, having been fooled into smuggling heroin by a man she thought she loved.

episodes.name: Colombia/Jungle Crash
episodes.overview: On a mission to find drug labs in the Colombian jungle, Keith Stansell crashes. He's kidnapped by FARC guerrillas and held hostage for over five years.

episodes.name: Panamania
episodes.overview: Party girl Christina spirals into addiction but sees a way out through drug smuggling.

episodes.name: Indian Hash Bust
episodes.overview: Mark joins an ashram looking for enlightenment, but he finds himself locked up in India.

episodes.name: Peruvian Parent Trap
episodes.overview: Paris and Marlon travel to Peru for an exciting business opportunityâending in the ultimate betrayal

episodes.name: Undercover Biker
episodes.overview: After his arrest, drug dealer Charles Falco is facing decades behind bars. Instead, he strikes a deal with the authorities and becomes a confidential informant - living a life undercover.

episodes.name: Korean Ecstasy King
episodes.overview: In South Korea, English teacher Jesse Moskel becomes the kingpin of a huge MDMA smuggling operation - and one of Southeast Asia's most wanted men.

episodes.name: Pop Star Smuggler
episodes.overview: Jimmy Bauer is on the cusp of breaking into the music industry and only one thing stands in his way. Money. He faces moral temptation and life-changing decisions, all as he works out what's more important to him. The fame? Or the music?

episodes.name: Undercover Arms Dealer
episodes.overview: When legitimate arms dealer Peter Bleach is asked to supply weapons for a suspected Indian terrorist cell, he agrees to go undercover for British Intelligence to capture the ringleader.

episodes.name: Model Drug Runner
episodes.overview: Stripper Garrain Jones hits the big-time when he stars in a BeyoncÃ© video, but then loses it all when he gets caught smuggling heroin through Europe.

episodes.name: Drug Runner Mom
episodes.overview: Struggling single mom Melanie Di Egidio risks all in exchange for a quick buck, but when the plan goes wrong Melanie is busted with 6 kilos of heroin, caught up in a high-profile sting, and sent to a tough Ecuadorian prison.

episodes.name: King of Weed
episodes.overview: Ice hockey star Ryan Phillips risks it all when he starts smuggling marijuana across the U.S. border, costing him his family, career and freedom.

episodes.name: Colombian Double Cross
episodes.overview: When the plan to smuggle marijuana from Mexico into the U.S. was interrupted, Steve Peterson faced time behind barsâ¦unless he could find a way to escape.

episodes.name: Peruvian Prison Break
episodes.overview: A wild-living exotic dancer leaves the club scene of Florida to make a dangerous journey into Peruâs drugs underworld, culminating in an insane prison escape.

episodes.name: Miami Mobster Take Down
episodes.overview: Miami mobster Tony Galeota is locked up in Panama after being framed for drug dealing and human trafficking. Can he prove his innocence and escape?

episodes.name: Declassified Mexican Cartel Takedown
episodes.overview: When a DEA Agent goes after a notorious cartel boss, he gets sucked into a treacherous world where a fatal mistake destroys his life.

episodes.name: Meth's Top Model
episodes.overview: When a famous swimwear model builds a beauty brand, it becomes the perfect ruse to smuggle drugs around the world, until her double life implodes.

episodes.name: Mafia Terminator
episodes.overview: In this real life Goodfellas tale, New York teen John Alite gets a job at his local Deli, a hangout for âwise guysâ. He soon finds himself wanting to be a mobster, and starts running errands for them.

episodes.name: Declassified Undercover Crack Dealer
episodes.overview: In this real-life version of Baltimore drama The Wire, local drug dealer Davon Mayer has a knack for making money. But when he gets arrested by two cops, to his surprise, they donât want him in jail, they want him to sell drugs for their profit.

episodes.name: Thai Ice Storm
episodes.overview: A broke young Londoner gets an exciting offer to work in his dadâs bar in Thailand. But when he arrives, he soon discovers a world of temptation that he canât resist, breaking his fatherâs golden rule and driving them apart.

episodes.name: The Mother's Load
episodes.overview: In this series we meet American, David, who was on a drug smuggling road trip from Afghanistan to Germany with his friend, Tom, when they were caught on the Turkish/Greek border and imprisoned in Greece.

episodes.name: Declassified: A Ratâs Tale
episodes.overview: When a lifelong gun runner and drug dealer infiltrates a blood thirsty biker gang for a million-dollar payout, he gets swept up in a horrific murder hit.

episodes.name: Declassified Mole In The Mob
episodes.overview: A Japanese-American Orange County kid gets his dream to become a gangster before a Las Vegas mob hit changes everything and he agrees to work for the FBI. Now Gangster turned informant he works his way up the world of organised crime infiltrating the heights of mafia royalty in New York, before a planned hit threatens to destroy his entire world.

episodes.name: 50 Ton Pot Run
episodes.overview: A 70s hippie and his naive pal are small time dealers selling hash to Boston college kids, until they get approached by a Colombian cartel keen to use their skills. Seduced by the danger and the dollars, they soon become multimillionaire importers, shipping tens of tons of marijuana on freighters up the West Coast, until one of the biggest busts in US history forces them on the run to Bolivia.

episodes.name: A Belly Full Of Coke
episodes.overview: A troubled young father goes on the run to Spain to avoid a small prison sentence. He starts working for a crime gang in the Costa Del Sol and is enamored by the gangster lifestyle. He feels untouchable and agrees to smuggle and swallow a kilo of cocaine back from Peru, only to face the biggest adrenalin kick of his life and seal his fate forever.

episodes.name: Narco Neverland
episodes.overview: To escape a life of poverty, a young Chicago gangster is drawn into smuggling drugs for a dangerous Mexican cartel, until the day it all goes wrong.

episodes.name: Declassified: Double Cross Dope Deal
episodes.overview: As the Cartels, DEA and a terrifying hitman all close in, drug runner Chris Heifner turns informant to save his family and take down his best friend.

episodes.name: Trauma Express
episodes.overview: Travel-loving Bronwyn Atherton finds herself on the road to destruction when she is lured into the shady world of international drug smuggling.

episodes.name: Love Behind Bars
episodes.overview: After smuggling drugs for eighteen months, Anelda Mare decides to quit, only to be told her parents will be killed unless she makes one last run.

episodes.name: Big Trouble in Tokyo
episodes.overview: Steven Beattie's Thai party lifestyle isn't cheap. He smuggles hash to fund it, but pays the ultimate price when he's locked up in Japan.

episodes.name: Declassified: A King's Ransom
episodes.overview: Rafael Arguelles is a gangster by the age of 17 but faces life-threatening consequences after going undercover for the FBI against his former friends.

episodes.name: Sole Smuggler
episodes.overview: David Harte is in his forties when his life collapses around him. He is tempted into the shady world of drug smuggling before being busted in Mauritius.

episodes.name: Fighting Yaba
episodes.overview: This installment details the true story of Boxing Billy Moore's struggle to survive inside Klong Prem Prison, the notorious "Bangkok Hilton". Billy Moore traveled to Thailand to escape a life of drug addiction and alcoholism. He managed to overcome his inner demons for awhile, but eventually relapsed after trying yaba, which is a highly addictive form of methamphetamine.

episodes.name: Casualty of War
episodes.overview: Veteran British soldier Brett Leonard Makinson, a retired parachute regiment medic, heads to India to overcome his PTSD but is soon tempted into smuggling weed out of the Himalayas to various parts of Europe. Caught and jailed in India, he is tortured until he signs a blank piece of paper for the Indian authorities.

episodes.name: Dame of Cocaine
episodes.overview: This is the true story of Andrea Mohr from Germany. She was involved in international drug smuggling and other criminal activities such as organized crime. She organized numerous drug trades around the world. She served a prison sentence from 1999 to 2004 in the high-security prison for women in Australia, in the Dame Phyllis Frost Centre near Melbourne, Victoria, Australia.
